channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Just crossed $30K ‚Äì what next?
item.description: Another milestone for the Small Account Journey has just been crossed. Last Friday, my small trading account crossed $30,000+. I started that account with just $2,000 a few months ago. That‚Äôs INSANE. But instead of just showing you all these great trades, I want to run through 3 reasons why I was able to pull [‚Ä¶]

item.title: My $2 million inheritance is sitting in cash ‚Äî and I have no idea where to start
item.description: A sudden windfall can cause all sorts of problems if you aren‚Äôt ready for it.

item.title: Weekly mortgage demand stalls, even though rates drop to lowest since April 2023
item.description: Mortgage rates fell last week for the fourth straight week, but neither current homeowners nor homebuyers seemed particularly impressed.

item.title: Foot Locker posts comparable sales growth for the first time in six quarters
item.description: Foot Locker has spent two years transforming its business, and it's now seeing sales and margins expand, indicating its efforts are finally starting to work.

item.title: Was this worth playing hooky for today ü§î
item.description: Good afternoon, Folks! Jeff Bishop here. Jason, Taiku & I will be in the Market Master‚Äôs Room this week to help cover for JW while he is taking some time to be with his family during this difficult time üôè. Look out for emails but I hope you were able to join me this morning [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Mortgage rates fall for fourth week in a row to lowest level in 16 months
item.description: Mortgage applications rose 0.5% on a weekly basis, the Mortgage Bankers Association said.

item.title: Goldman issues warning on how quickly market confidence has recovered from an August stocks slump
item.description: The speedy return of market confidence following a global sell-off in risky assets should be seen as a cause for concern, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: U.S. government researchers visit a Korean mine as the race against China for critical minerals heats up
item.description: The Sangdong Mine, owned by a subsidiary of Canada-based Almonty Industries, is set to resume operations this year.

item.title: Increased HIV screener sales has this tiny cap soaring
item.description: Good day, 360! Here are our top investing ideas today. And don‚Äôt forget to join us in Market Masters ‚Äì Jeff Bishop is in there NOW trading his Top Pick of the Day‚Ä¶ and more! Be the best prepared trader on the Street! FOCUS LISTüîé TRIB ‚Äì Up over 70% in the pre-market after announcing [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Relief is on the way for hot, hungry trekkers on the Great Wall of China: 5-minute deliveries by drone
item.description: Market leader Meituan has launched a service that flies food, drink, medicines and other parcels from a nearby hotel rooftop to one of the ancient wall‚Äôs watchtowers.

item.title: Treasury yields slip as investors look ahead to U.S. inflation data
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury dipped on Wednesday as investors awaited a key U.S. inflation report due later in the week.

item.title: Goldman issues warning on how quickly market confidence has recovered from an August stocks slump
item.description: The speedy return of market confidence following a global sell-off in risky assets should be seen as a cause for concern, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Don‚Äôt fall for the ‚Äútrampoline trap‚Äù
item.description: My favorite part of Small Account Journey isn‚Äôt just showing you what trades I make. Don‚Äôt get me wrong: I love watching these small $2,000 trading accounts move their way up as I trade. It‚Äôs fun. The best part, though, is being able to show you the HOW and the WHY behind every trade. Then [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Here‚Äôs how Nvidia can keep crushing its AI rivals and the stock market
item.description: Tech giant must hurdle 3 major obstacles that could potentially disrupt growth.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield inches higher as investors weigh likelihood of U.S. interest rate cut
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury rose on Tuesday after the Federal Reserve boosted already-high expectations for imminent interest rate cuts.

item.title: Apple eyes bigger slice of India's streaming, music market with Airtel deal
item.description: Apple is tying up with India's Airtel to offer the telecom firm's premium customers its music and video streaming services for free.

item.title: How do you hunt down short-term trades?
item.description: What chart do you look to for short-term wins? You know me, I don‚Äôt want to wait around too long for trades to pay out. But I also am not interested in taking on a bunch of sloppy, risky trades in hopes of getting those. That‚Äôs why I lean heavily on my Gamma Trigger System [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Why this tech investor says Nvidia‚Äôs Huang, and Tesla‚Äôs Musk, are the best CEOs
item.description: Gavin Baker, the chief investment officer at Atreides Management, is a fan of two of the Magnificent Seven CEOs.

item.title: Eli Lilly releases new form of weight loss drug Zepbound for half the price to boost access, supply
item.description: Eli Lilly is offering 2.5-milligram and 5-milligram single-dose vials of Zepbound for $399 per month and $549 per month, respectively.

item.title: China‚Äôs state media: Canada is 'shooting itself in the foot‚Äô with new EV tariffs
item.description: On Monday, Canada announced that it would import 100% tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, effective Oct. 1.
